Qazaq Keyboard is available by default. Absolutely free keyboard allows you to use the Kazakh keyboard, as standard in all applications!  Qazaq Keyboard - includes the following functions: 1. Support vertical and landscape view; 10. Turn on and off the sounds of the keyboard; 11. The choice of sound keys; 12. Automatically capitalized after the end of a sentence; 13.
